thread.title: Hong Kong Giant Swire Pacific Should Abandon This Colonial Relic
thread.title_full: Hong Kong Giant Swire Pacific Should Abandon This Colonial Relic - WSJ

author: Abheek Bhattacharya
title: Hong Kong Giant Swire Pacific Should Abandon This Colonial Relic
text:
Swire Pacific sticks out like a sore thumb in Hong Kong, the only listed firm in the Chinese territory with two classes of shares. But it has put itself in position to change that, a move that could benefit canny investors.
One of the great corporate benefactors of British colonial rule in Asia, Swire Pacific is controlled from London, but headquartered in Hong Kong, with interests spanning Cathay Pacific Airways, central Beijing...
